title: Chopped Cheese - Healthy Weeknight Meal
ingredients: 1hoagie style roll or bread of choice, toasted
directions: Set a pan on medium-high heat with a spritz of baking spray.
Once hot, add the ground meat and sprinkle over some salt, a pinch of msg, garlic powder, chile powder, smoked paprika, and a bit of onion powder. Chop everything together with a spatula
While that cooks, slice the cherry peppers, tomato and lettuce.

Once the beef is cooked, pile that together in the shape of your bread and put the peppers over the top followed by two slices of American cheese. Place a lid on, to let the cheese melt and remove from the heat.
Load up the bread with the meat and cheese and top with tomatoes. Add a pinch of salt and a couple of cranks of black pepper before adding the lettuce.
Wrap the sandwich in parchment paper before slicing in half and devouring it.
